sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import { TezosNodeWriter, TezosParameterFormat } from "conseiljs"; import "./App.css"; // Key manager var key_name = "test_key1"; var key = require(`../../keystore/${key_name}`); var tezosNode = "https://testnet.tezster.tech", contractAddress = "KT1Bkt73XQnX7KXGVxqRrihDwLRqxz3KZ5Da"; // App component class App extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { contract: contractAddress, wallet: key.publicKeyHash, address: "", amount: "", duration: "", index: "", latest_Og: "", }; this.handleInputChange = this.handleInputChange.bind(this); this.mintToken = this.mintToken.bind(this); this.paid = this.paid.bind(this); this.lend = this.lend.bind(this); this.borrowreq = this.borrowreq.bind(this); } handleInputChange(event) { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value, }); } async mintToken() { console.log(this.state.address, this.state.amount); var keystore = key, amount = 1, fee = 100000, storage_limit = 1000, gas_limit = 200000, entry_point = undefined, parameters = `(Right (Left (Right (Pair "${this.state.address}" ${this.state.amount}))))`, derivation_path = ""; // TezosNodeWriter is responsible for writing in the Tezos Blockchain and costs GAS const result = await TezosNodeWriter.sendContractInvocationOperation( tezosNode, keystore, contractAddress, amount, fee, derivation_path, storage_limit, gas_limit, entry_point, parameters, TezosParameterFormat.Michelson ); this.setState({ latest_Og: result.operationGroupID }); alert( `Injected operation ! \n Invocation Group ID : ${result.operationGroupID}` ); } async borrowreq() { console.log(this.state.amount, this.state.duration); var keystore = key, amount = 1, fee = 100000, storage_limit = 1000, gas_limit = 200000, entry_point = undefined, parameters = `(Left (Left (Left (Pair "${this.state.amount}" ${this.state.duration}))))`, derivation_path = ""; // TezosNodeWriter is responsible for writing in the Tezos Blockchain and costs GAS const result = await TezosNodeWriter.sendContractInvocationOperation( tezosNode, keystore, contractAddress, amount, fee, derivation_path, storage_limit, gas_limit, entry_point, parameters, TezosParameterFormat.Michelson ); this.setState({ latest_Og: result.operationGroupID }); alert( `Injected operation ! \n Invocation Group ID : ${result.operationGroupID}` ); } async lend() { console.log(this.state.index); var keystore = key, amount = 1, fee = 100000, storage_limit = 1000, gas_limit = 200000, entry_point = undefined, parameters = `(Right (Left (Right ${this.state.index})))`, derivation_path = ""; console.log(parameters); // TezosNodeWriter is responsible for writing in the Tezos Blockchain and costs GAS const result = await TezosNodeWriter.sendContractInvocationOperation( tezosNode, keystore, contractAddress, amount, fee, derivation_path, storage_limit, gas_limit, entry_point, parameters, TezosParameterFormat.Michelson ); console.log(result.operationGroupID); this.setState({ latest_Og: result.operationGroupID }); alert( `Injected operation ! \n Invocation Group ID : ${result.operationGroupID}` ); } async paid() { console.log(this.state.index, this.state.amount); var keystore = key, amount = 1, fee = 100000, storage_limit = 1000, gas_limit = 200000, entry_point = undefined, parameters = `(Right (Right (Right (Left (Pair ${this.state.index} ${this.state.amount})))))`, derivation_path = ""; console.log(parameters); // TezosNodeWriter is responsible for writing in the Tezos Blockchain and costs GAS const result = await TezosNodeWriter.sendContractInvocationOperation( tezosNode, keystore, contractAddress, amount, fee, derivation_path, storage_limit, gas_limit, entry_point, parameters, TezosParameterFormat.Michelson ); console.log(result.operationGroupID); this.setState({ latest_Og: result.operationGroupID }); alert( `Injected operation ! \n Invocation Group ID : ${result.operationGroupID}` ); } render() { return (

{" "} P2P Lending


Contract Address Interacting with : {this.state.contract}


Wallet Address Detected : {this.state.wallet}

Latest Operation Group ID : {this.state.latest_Og}

Mint Token

Address
Token Count

Token minted for : {this.state.address}

Token Count : {this.state.amount}


Borrow Money

Amount
Duration of Loan

Amount : {this.state.amount}

Duration : {this.state.duration}


Lend

Loan Index

Loan Index : {this.state.index}


Pay Back Loan

Index
Amount

Amount : {this.state.amount}

Duration : {this.state.duration}


P2P Lending : Madhav Aggarwal
); } } export default App;
